anya-e0103n3:1_5: Kenaṭṭhena samādhīti kena atthena samādhīti vuccati,
anya-e0103n3:1_6: ‘‘samādhī’’ti padaṁ kaṁ abhidheyyatthaṁ nissāya pavattanti attho.
anya-e0103n3:2_1: vibhāgavantānaṁ pana sarūpavibhāvanaṁ vibhāgadassanamukheneva hotīti vibhāgo tāva anavasesato dassetabbo.
anya-e0103n3:2_2: Taṁdassane ca ayamādīnavoti dassetuṁ ‘‘samādhi bahuvidho’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:2_5: Na sādheyyāti lokiyasamādhissa bhāvanā idha adhippetattho,
anya-e0103n3:2_7: Jhānavimokkhādīsu hi samādhiṁ uddharitvā tassa labbhamānehi vibhāgehi vissajjane kariyamāne jhānavibhaṅgādīsu (vibha.
anya-e0103n3:2_8: 508 ādayo) āgato sabbo samādhipabhedo vissajjetabbo siyā.
anya-e0103n3:2_9: Tathā ca sati yvāyaṁ lokiyasamādhissa bhāvanāvidhi adhippeto,
anya-e0103n3:2_11: Kiñca yenassa tikacatukkajhānikena hīnādibhedabhinnena pavattivibhāgena brahmapārisajjādivasena navavidho,
anya-e0103n3:2_12: pañcamajjhānikena vehapphalādivasena dasavidho vā ekādasavidho vā bhavappabhedo nippajjati.
anya-e0103n3:2_13: Svāssa pavattivibhāgo ayaṁ soti niddhāretvā vuccamāno vikkhepāya siyā,
anya-e0103n3:3_0: Cittacetasikānaṁ samaṁ avisāravasena sampiṇḍentassa viya ādhānaṁ samādhānaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:3_8: Tathā hesa ‘‘cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhitī’’ti (dha. sa.
anya-e0103n3:4_1: sampayuttā vā na vikkhipanti etenāti avikkhepo,
anya-e0103n3:5_2: na tenassa koci vibhāgo labbhatīti āha ‘‘avikkhepalakkhaṇena tāva ekavidho’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:5_3: Sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe appento viya pavattatīti vitakko appanā.
anya-e0103n3:5_6: Tappamukhatāvasena pana sabbasmiṁ mahaggatānuttare jhānadhamme ‘‘appanā’’ti aṭṭhakathāvohāro.
anya-e0103n3:5_8: Gāmādīnaṁ samīpaṭṭhāne gāmūpacārādisamaññā viyāti āha ‘‘upacārappanāvasena duvidho’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:5_13: Tattha apariyāpannatāya lokato uttaro uttiṇṇoti lokuttaro.
anya-e0103n3:5_15: ubhayaṁ pana ekajjhaṁ gahetvā tato itaraṁ niddhāretuṁ ‘‘lokiyalokuttaravasena duvidho’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:5_28: upekkhāsahagata-padena pana nippītikekadesovāti ayametesaṁ padānaṁ viseso.
anya-e0103n3:6_8: savitakko ca so savicāro cāti savitakkasavicāro.
anya-e0103n3:6_11: Tattha vicārato uttari vitakkena sampayogābhāvato avitakko ca so vicāramatto cāti avitakkavicāramatto.
anya-e0103n3:6_13: Savitakkasavicāro hi samādhi vitakkavisiṭṭhena vicārena savicāro,
anya-e0103n3:6_16: Atha vā bhāvanāya pahīnattā vitakkābhāvenāyaṁ vicāramatto,
anya-e0103n3:6_17: na vicārato aññassa attano sampayuttadhammassa kassaci abhāvāti dassetuṁ avitakka-vacanena vicāramatta-padaṁ visesetvā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:6_28: mahantehi vā uḷāracchandādīhi gato paṭipannoti mahaggato.
anya-e0103n3:7_3: Pakatipaññāya abhivisiṭṭhattā abhiññā nāma appanāvahā bhāvanāpaññā,
anya-e0103n3:7_5: Dukkhāpaṭipado ca so dandhābhiñño cāti dukkhāpaṭipadādandhābhiñño, samādhi.
anya-e0103n3:9_1: Imesaṁ vasenāti imesaṁ dasannaṁ kammaṭṭhānānaṁ vasena.
anya-e0103n3:9_2: ‘‘Pubbabhāge ekaggatā’’ti iminā appanāya upakārakanānāvajjanupacārassapi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0103n3:10_3: siyā nippītikoti aniyamavacanaṁ upacārasamādhisāmaññena sabbesampi vā jhānānaṁ nānāvajjanavīthiyaṁ upacārasamādhi siyā sappītiko,
anya-e0103n3:10_5: Ekāvajjanavīthiyaṁ pana ādito dukatikajjhānānaṁ upacārasamādhi sappītikova,
anya-e0103n3:10_10: siyā upekkhāsahagatoti etthāpi vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n3:12_3: Subhāvitoti suṭṭhu bhāvito sammadeva paguṇataṁ upanīto.
anya-e0103n3:13_0: Saddhiṁ upacārasamādhināti sabbesampi jhānānaṁ upacārasamādhinā saha.
anya-e0103n3:13_1: Vitakkamatteyeva ādīnavaṁdisvāti vitakkeyeva oḷārikato upaṭṭhahante ‘‘cittassa khobhakaradhammo aya’’nti
anya-e0103n3:13_2: ādīnavaṁ disvā vicārañca santato manasi karitvā.
anya-e0103n3:13_4: Taṁ sandhāyāti taṁ evaṁ paṭiladdhaṁ samādhiṁ sandhāya.
anya-e0103n3:14_6: Pītisukhasahagato vāti etthāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n3:14_7: Ettha ca satipi pītisahagatassāpi samādhissa sukhasahagatatte tīṇipi padāni asaṅkarato dassetuṁ nippītikasukhato
anya-e0103n3:14_8: sappītikasukhassa visesadassanatthaṁ satthu pītitikadesanāti nippītikasseva sukhassa vasena sukhasahagato
anya-e0103n3:15_1: Cittuppādo hi sahajātadhammānaṁ uppattiṭṭhānatāya ‘‘bhūmī’’ti vuccati ‘‘sukhabhūmiyaṁ kāmāvacare’’tiādīsu (dha. sa.
anya-e0103n3:17_0: Paṭhamasamannāhāro bhāvanaṁ ārabhantassa ‘‘pathavī pathavī’’tiādinā kammaṭṭhāne paṭhamābhiniveso.
anya-e0103n3:17_1: Tassa tassa jhānassa upacāranti nīvaraṇavitakkavicāranikantiādīnaṁ vūpasame thirabhūtaṁ kāmāvacarajjhānaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:17_2: ‘‘Yāva appanā’’ti iminā pubbabhāgapaññāya eva abhiññābhāvo vutto viya dissatīti vadanti .
anya-e0103n3:18_1: Asappāyasevīti upacārādhigamato pubbe asappāyasevitāya dukkhā paṭipadā.
anya-e0103n3:18_6: Tassa vomissakatāti yo pubbabhāge asappāyaṁ sevitvā aparabhāge sappāyasevī,
anya-e0103n3:18_12: Asampāditaappanākosallassa ñāṇassa avisadatāya dandhā abhiññā hoti,
anya-e0103n3:19_3: Taṇhāya samādhissa ujupaṭipakkhattā sā samathapaṭipadāya paripanthinīti āha ‘‘taṇhābhibhūtassa hi dukkhā paṭipadā hotī’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:19_4: Abhibhavo cassā itarakilesehi adhikatāya anabhibhūtassa taṇhāyāti adhikārato veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:19_5: Tathā avijjā paññāya ujupaṭipakkhāti tadabhibhūtassa dandhābhiññatā vuttā.
anya-e0103n3:19_6: Akatādhikāroti bhavantare akataparicayo yathā paguṇaṁ katvā vissaṭṭhagantho appamattakena payogena suppavatti vācuggatova hoti,
anya-e0103n3:19_7: evaṁ pubbe kataparicayassa bhāvanā appakasireneva ijjhatīti āha ‘‘katādhikārassa sukhā’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:19_9: kato ca adhikāro samathanissito paṭipadāyaṁ vutto samādhippadhānattā paṭipadāya.
anya-e0103n3:20_0: Yathāvuttā paṭipadābhiññā puggalādhiṭṭhānāti dhammaniddesampi puggalādhiṭṭhānamukhena dassetuṁ ‘‘yo puggalo’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:20_3: Ayaṁ parittoti ayaṁ samādhi appānubhāvatāya paritto.
anya-e0103n3:20_4: Avaḍḍhiteti ekaṅguladvaṅgulamattampi na vaḍḍhite yathāupaṭṭhite ārammaṇe.
anya-e0103n3:20_6: ‘‘Paguṇo subhāvito’’ti vatvā ‘‘uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṁ sakkotī’’ti iminā yathā paguṇopi uparijhānassa
anya-e0103n3:20_7: paccayo bhavituṁ asakkonto samādhi parittoyeva hoti,
anya-e0103n3:20_9: evaṁ ñāṇuttarassa ekāsaneneva uparijhānanibbattanenāti subhāvitopi uparijhānassa paccayabhāvasaṅkhātāya
anya-e0103n3:20_11: Apare pana sace subhāvito paguṇo vasībhāvaṁ patto uparijhānassa paccayo ahontopi appamāṇo eva,
anya-e0103n3:20_13: Vuttalakkhaṇavomissatāyāti yo appaguṇo uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṁ na sakkoti,
anya-e0103n3:20_16: Yo pana paguṇo uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṁ sakkoti,
anya-e0103n3:20_18: ayaṁ appamāṇo parittārammaṇoti evaṁ paṭhamacatutthasamādhīnaṁ vuttalakkhaṇassa vomissakabhāvena dutiyatatiyasamādhisaṅgāhako vomissakanayo veditabbo.
anya-e0103n3:21_3: ‘‘senaṅgaṁ rathaṅga’’ntiādīsu viyāti āha ‘‘catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ aṅgabhūtā cattāro samādhī’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:22_3: Ālayassa apekkhāya apariccajanato ṭhitiṁ bhajatīti ṭhitibhāgiyo.
anya-e0103n3:22_5: Paccanīkasamudācāravasenāti tassa tassa jhānassa paccanīkānaṁ nīvaraṇavitakkavicārādīnaṁ pavattivasena.
anya-e0103n3:22_11: Tattha sāpekkhassa upari visesaṁ nibbattetuṁ asakkuṇeyyattā avigatanikantikā taṁtaṁpariharaṇasatītipi vattuṁ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0103n3:22_12: Evañca katvā ‘‘satiyā vā nikantiyā vā’’ti vikappavacanañca yuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0103n3:22_17: Nibbedhabhāgiyatāti saccānaṁ nibbijjhanapakkhikatā vipassanāya saṁvattatīti attho.
anya-e0103n3:23_2: Avitakkasahagatāti ‘‘kathaṁ nu kho me avitakkaṁ jhānaṁ bhaveyyā’’ti evaṁ avitakkārammaṇā avitakkavisayā.
anya-e0103n3:23_4: samādhissāpi panettha saṅgaho atthevāti udāharaṇassa sātthakataṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘tāya pana paññāya sampayuttā
anya-e0103n3:23_5: samādhīpi cattāro hontī’’ti tesaṁ vasena evaṁ vuttanti attho.
anya-e0103n3:24_0: Bhāvanāmayassa samādhissa idhādhippetattā upacārekaggatā ‘‘kāmāvacaro samādhī’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:24_4: Labhati samādhinti evaṁ yaṁ samādhiṁ labhati,
anya-e0103n3:25_1: Aññattha sampayogavasena vicārena saha vattamāno vitakko pañcakanaye dutiyajjhāne viyojitopi na suṭṭhu viyojitoti,
anya-e0103n3:25_2: tena saddhiṁyeva vicārasamatikkamaṁ dassetuṁ vuttaṁ ‘‘vitakkavicārātikkamena tatiya’’nti.
anya-e0103n3:25_3: Dvidhā bhinditvā catukkabhede vuttaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānanti yojanā.
anya-e0103n3:25_4: Pañcajhānaṅgavasenāti pañcannaṁ jhānānaṁ aṅgabhāvavasena samādhissa pañcavidhatā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n3:26_3: Tattha hānabhāgiyo dhammoti apaguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṁ kāmādianupakkhandanaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:26_4: Visesabhāgiyo dhammoti paguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṁ dutiyajjhānādianupakkhandanaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:26_7: apaguṇassa paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhīnaṁ tato vuṭṭhitaṁ ārammaṇavasena kāmasahagatā hutvā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti codenti tudanti,
anya-e0103n3:26_8: tassa kāmānupakkhandānaṁ saññāmanasikārānaṁ vasena sā paṭhamajjhānapaññā hāyati,
anya-e0103n3:26_10: Avitakkasahagatāti avitakkaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ santato paṇītato manasi karoto ārammaṇavasena avitakkasahagatā
anya-e0103n3:26_11: samudācaranti paguṇapaṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhitaṁ dutiyajjhānādhigamatthāya codenti tudanti,
anya-e0103n3:26_12: tassa dutiyajjhānānupakkhandānaṁ saññāmanasikārānaṁ vasena paṭhamajjhānapaññā visesabhūtassa dutiyajjhānassa
anya-e0103n3:26_15: Iminā nayenāti iminā paṭhamajjhāne vuttena vidhinā dutiyajjhānādīsupi hānabhāgiyadhammo,
anya-e0103n3:28_1: sappītikādiggahaṇena sādhāraṇato ca ariyamaggasampayutto samādhi vutto.
anya-e0103n3:28_4: Visunti paññābhāvanāya visuṁ katvā na vadāma.
anya-e0103n3:29_0: Kammaṭṭhānabhāvanaṁ paribundheti uparodheti pavattituṁ na detīti palibodho ra-kārassa la-kāraṁ katvā,
anya-e0103n3:30_4: Navakammādīsūti ādi-saddena āvāsassa tadaññaṁ abhivuddhikāraṇaṁ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n3:31_2: ‘‘Nāmā’’ti iminā tassa padesassa ayaṁ samaññāti dasseti.
anya-e0103n3:31_3: Paṭisāmitamevāti niccakālaṁ paṭisāmetvāva vihārato nikkhamāmīti dasseti.
anya-e0103n3:31_6: Etena ‘‘bhikkhunā nāma āvāse evarūpena bhavitabba’’nti ovādo dinno hoti.
anya-e0103n3:32_0: Kulanti kulaggahaṇena kulamanussānaṁ gahaṇaṁ gāmaggahaṇena gāmavāsīnaṁ viya.
anya-e0103n3:33_1: Sadāti gatakālato pabhuti visesato pavāritadivasato paṭṭhāya sabbadā divase divase.
anya-e0103n3:33_3: Sabbaṁ pavattinti attanā tattha diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya pacchā samāgamapariyosānaṁ daharassa sabbaṁ pavattiṁ.
anya-e0103n3:34_1: Rathavinītapaṭipadanti dasakathāvatthukittanapubbikaṁ rathavinītūpamāhi vibhāvitaṁ rathavinītasutte (ma. ni.
anya-e0103n3:36_0: Ghāsesanaṁ chinnakatho, na vācaṁ payutaṁ bhaṇe’’. (su. ni. 716);
anya-e0103n3:37_0: ‘‘Gāme ca nābhisajjeyya, lābhakamyā janaṁ na lapayeyyā’’ti. (su. ni. 935) –
anya-e0103n3:39_3: Piṇḍapātaṁ tāva dentā buddhapūjāpattacīvarādīni tassa parivārāni katvā denti,
anya-e0103n3:39_6: Vadantīti purimadivase bhikkhāya āhiṇḍanakāle yathāsutaṁ vadanti.
anya-e0103n3:40_2: Evanti idāni vuccamānākārena gaṇavācakassa pariyesanampi lahukameva icchitabbanti āha ‘‘yojanato paraṁ agantvā’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:41_0: Katākateti kate ca akate ca kamme jānanavasena ussukkaṁ āpajjitabbaṁ,
anya-e0103n3:41_1: katākateti vā appake ca mahante ca kate,
anya-e0103n3:42_0: Pabbajjāpekkhoti sīhaḷadīpe kira kuladārakānaṁ pabbajjā āvāhavivāhasadisā,
anya-e0103n3:42_1: tasmā taṁ paricchinnadivasaṁ atikkametuṁ na sakkā.
anya-e0103n3:42_2: ‘‘Sace taṁ alabhanto na sakkoti adhivāsetu’’ntiādinā samāpanena palibodhupacchedo vutto,
anya-e0103n3:42_3: byatirekato pana ‘‘sace taṁ alabhanto sakkoti adhivāsetuṁ,
anya-e0103n3:42_4: araññaṁ pavisitvā samaṇadhammova kātabbo’’ti ayamattho dassitoti saṅgahaṇena palibodhupacchedo veditabbo.
anya-e0103n3:43_0: Tathāti yathā upajjhāyo gilāno yāvajīvaṁ upaṭṭhātabbo,
anya-e0103n3:43_1: tathā upasampāditaantevāsiko attano kammavācaṁ vatvā upasampādito.
anya-e0103n3:44_0: Yo koci rogoti mūlabhūto, anubandho vā attano uppanno. Anamataggeti anu anu amatagge anādimati.
anya-e0103n3:45_3: Yassa ganthadhuraṁ vissajjetvā ṭhitassāpi gantho vattateva,
anya-e0103n3:45_9: Puna na olokessāmīti kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā ganthadhuraṁ vissajjemīti attho.
anya-e0103n3:46_8: Attano ācariyānanti attano kathetuṁ yuttānaṁ ācariyānaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:46_9: Suvinicchitā sabbā tipiṭakapariyatti etasmiṁ atthīti sabbapariyattiko,
anya-e0103n3:46_11: Pīṭhe nisinno tato otaritvā bhūmiyaṁ taṭṭikāya nisīditvā.
anya-e0103n3:46_13: Cīvaraṁ pārupitvāti ācariyassa apacitidassanatthaṁ parimaṇḍalaṁ cīvaraṁ pārupitvā.
anya-e0103n3:47_6: Yebhuyyena hi jhānalābhī samathayānikova hoti vipassanāsukhato.
anya-e0103n3:49_4: Paricchinditvāti ‘‘imasmiṁ vihāre sabbe bhikkhū’’ti evaṁ paricchinditvā.
anya-e0103n3:49_7: ayañca sahavāsīnaṁ cittamaddavajananādiattho ‘‘manussānaṁ piyo hotī’’tiādinayappavattena mettānisaṁsasuttena (a. ni. 11.15; paṭi. ma. 2.22; mi. pa.
anya-e0103n3:50_0: Niccaṁ pariharitabbattāti sabbatthakakammaṭṭhānaṁ viya ekadāva ananuyuñjitvā sabbakālaṁ pariharaṇīyattā anuyuñjitabbattā.
anya-e0103n3:50_2: Kalyāṇamitto hi saddhāsampanno hoti sīlasampanno sutasampanno cāgasampanno vīriyasampanno satisampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno.
anya-e0103n3:50_5: tena sammāsambodhiyā hetubhūtaṁ sattesu hitesitaṁ na pariccajati.
anya-e0103n3:50_6: Sīlasampattiyā sattānaṁ piyo hoti garu bhāvanīyo codako pāpagarahī vattā vacanakkhamo,
anya-e0103n3:50_7: sutasampattiyā saccapaṭiccasamuppādādipaṭisaṁyuttānaṁ gambhīrānaṁ kathānaṁ kattā hoti,
anya-e0103n3:50_8: cāgasampattiyā appiccho hoti santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṁsaṭṭho,
anya-e0103n3:50_13: So satiyā kusalākusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ gatiyo samannesamāno paññāya sattānaṁ hitāhitaṁ yathābhūtaṁ jānitvā
anya-e0103n3:50_14: samādhinā tattha ekaggacitto hutvā vīriyena satte ahitaṁ nisedhetvā hite niyojeti.
anya-e0103n3:51_0: Taṁ pana kalyāṇamittaṁ paramukkaṁsagataṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘mamaṁ hī’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:51_10: Na attanomatiṁ pakāseti kathetīti na attanomatiko,
anya-e0103n3:51_11: attano matiṁ paggayha vattā na hotīti attho.
anya-e0103n3:52_0: ‘‘Pubbe vuttakhīṇāsavādayo’’tiādi ekaccakhīṇāsavato bahussutova kammaṭṭhānadāne seyyoti dassanatthaṁ āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:52_1: Tattha pubbe vuttakhīṇāsavādayoti ‘‘yaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetukāmo’’tiādinā vuttakhīṇāsavādikā.
anya-e0103n3:52_2: Uggahaparipucchānaṁ visodhitattāti uggahetabbato ‘‘uggaho’’ti laddhanāmāya kammaṭṭhānupakārāya pāḷiyā,
anya-e0103n3:52_3: tadatthaṁ paripucchanato ‘‘paripucchā’’ti laddhasamaññāya atthasaṁvaṇṇanāya ca visesato sodhitattā niggumbaṁ nijjaṭaṁ katvā gahitattā.
anya-e0103n3:52_4: Ito cito ca suttañca kāraṇañca sallakkhetvāti pañcasupi nikāyesu ito cito ca tassa tassa kammaṭṭhānassa
anya-e0103n3:52_5: anurūpaṁ suttapadañceva suttānugataṁ yuttiñca suṭṭhu upalakkhetvā.
anya-e0103n3:52_8: samādāya vā sammadeva hadaye ṭhapetvāti attho.
anya-e0103n3:52_9: Mahāmaggaṁ dassentoti kammaṭṭhānavidhiṁ mahāmaggaṁ katvā dassento.
anya-e0103n3:53_2: nikkhamanakāle gamikavattanti yathārahaṁ taṁ taṁ vattaṁ pūrentena.
anya-e0103n3:55_1: Santāne rāgassa ussannabhāvena caraṇaṁ pavatti rāgacariyā,
anya-e0103n3:55_8: Imā eva hi sandhāya ‘‘aparāpi catasso’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:55_10: tathā saddhādīnaṁ saṁsaggasannipātavasena saddhābuddhicariyā saddhāvitakkacariyā buddhivitakkacariyā saddhābuddhivitakkacariyāti.
anya-e0103n3:55_16: tā pana asammohantena saṁyuttasuttaṭīkāyaṁ vitthārato dassitāti tattha vuttanayena veditabbā.
anya-e0103n3:55_17: ‘‘Pakatī’’ti iminā asati paṭipakkhabhāvanāyaṁ tattha tattha santāne cariyāya sabhāvabhūtataṁ dasseti.
anya-e0103n3:55_19: yato rāgacariyādīnaṁ paccayasamavāye rāgādayo balavanto honti,
anya-e0103n3:55_21: Tāsaṁ vasenāti channaṁ mūlacariyānaṁ vasena chaḷeva puggalā honti.
anya-e0103n3:55_23: tathā ca sati adhippetatthasiddhi ca na siyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n3:56_0: Saddhā balavatī hoti rāgussanne santāne tadanuguṇassa dhammassa niyogato adhikabhāvasambhavato.
anya-e0103n3:56_3: Sabhāgo hi dūrepi āsanneyevāti sabhāgatālakkhaṇamidha āsannaggahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:56_4: Tattha saddhāya siniyhanaṁ pasādavasena akālussiyaṁ alūkhatā ,
anya-e0103n3:56_9: rāgassa abhisaṅgavasenāti evaṁ bhinnasabhāvānampi tesaṁ yathā alūkhatādisāmaññena sabhāgatā,
anya-e0103n3:56_10: evaṁ taṁsamaṅgīnampi puggalānanti āha ‘‘rāgacaritassa saddhācarito sabhāgo’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:57_0: Paññā balavatī hoti dosussanne santāne tadanuguṇassa dhammassa niyogato adhikabhāvasambhavato.
anya-e0103n3:57_3: Tattha paññāya ārammaṇassa anallīyanaṁ tassa yathāsabhāvāvabodhavasena visaṁsaṭṭhatā,
anya-e0103n3:57_8: dosassa ahitādhānavasena chaḍḍananti evaṁ bhinnasabhāvānampi tesaṁ yathā anallīyanādisāmaññena sabhāgatā,
anya-e0103n3:57_9: evaṁ taṁsamaṅgīnampi puggalānanti āha ‘‘dosacaritassa buddhicarito sabhāgo’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:58_0: Antarāyakarā vitakkāti micchāvitakkā micchāsaṅkappā uppajjanti mohussanne santāne tadanuguṇassa dhammassa yebhuyyena pavattisabbhāvato.
anya-e0103n3:58_6: mohassa anogāḷhatāyāti evaṁ bhinnasabhāvānampi tesaṁ yathā anavaṭṭhānādisāmaññena sabhāgatā,
anya-e0103n3:58_7: evaṁ taṁsamaṅgīnampi puggalānanti āha ‘‘mohacaritassa vitakkacarito sabhāgo’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:59_3: dosādayo viya tena vippayutto natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n3:59_7: Kāmañcettha yathā rāgadosehi sampayogavasena saha vattamānassapi mohassa ussannatāvasena visuṁ cariyābhāvo,
anya-e0103n3:59_10: Evaṁ rāgena satipi sampayoge mānassāpi visuṁ cariyābhāvo yutto siyā,
anya-e0103n3:59_11: evaṁ santepi rāgapaṭighamānadiṭṭhivicikicchāvijjānaṁ viya anusayaṭṭho imesaṁ rāgādīnaṁyeva āveṇiko cariyaṭṭhoti,
anya-e0103n3:59_15: Eteneva diṭṭhiyāpi visuṁ cariyābhāvābhāvo saṁvaṇṇitoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n3:59_16: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana mohacariyantogadhāva diṭṭhicariyāti dassetuṁ ‘‘mohanidānattā cā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:60_10: Etena asati pubbahetuniyāme yathāvuttakāraṇamattena na tesaṁ luddhatā,
anya-e0103n3:61_0: Itareti chedanādikammabahulā nirayādito idhūpapannā ca na sabbe dosamohacaritā eva hontīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n3:61_2: mūḷhabhāve ca anekantikattā dosamohacaritatāyapi anekaṁsikatā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n3:61_6: sopi ekaṁsiko na upalabbhatīti dassento āha ‘‘yathāvutteneva nayena ussadaniyamo nāma natthī’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:61_8: Dosaniyameti semhādidosādhikatāya rāgādicarito hotīti dosavasena cariyāniyame ‘‘semhādhiko rāgacarito’’ti vatvā puna ‘‘semhādhiko mohacarito’’ti,
anya-e0103n3:61_9: ‘‘vātādhiko mohacarito’’ti vatvā puna ‘‘vātādhiko rāgacarito’’ti ca vuttattā tampi dosavasena niyamavacanaṁ pubbāparaviruddhameva.
anya-e0103n3:61_10: Aparicchinnavacananti paricchedakārikāya paññāya na paricchinditvā vuttavacanaṁ,
anya-e0103n3:62_2: Niyāmoti ca tesaṁyeva lobhādīnaṁ paṭiniyato lubbhanādisabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n3:62_7: Tena ye ime lobhussadatādīnaṁ paccekaṁ vomissato ca cuddasa pabhedā icchitā,
anya-e0103n3:62_8: te anavasesato sampiṇḍeti yathāvuttesu chasveva tesaṁ antogadhattā.
anya-e0103n3:63_0: Idāni taṁ nesaṁ lobhussadatādīnaṁ paccekaṁ vomissakatādiṁ vibhāgena dassetuṁ ‘‘yassa hī’’tiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:63_2: Lobho balavāti lobho tajjāya paccayasāmaggiyā sāmatthiyato adhiko hoti.
anya-e0103n3:63_4: Kathaṁ panete lobhālobhā aññamaññaṁ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā ekakkhaṇe pavattantīti?
anya-e0103n3:63_5: Na kho panetaṁ evaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ ‘‘ekakkhaṇe pavattantī’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:63_6: Nikantikkhaṇaṁ pana āyūhanapakkhiyameva katvā evaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:63_9: Yo hi ‘‘evaṁsundaraṁ evaṁvipulaṁ evaṁmahagghañca na sakkā dātu’’ntiādinā amuttacāgatādivasena pavattāya cetanāya sampayutto alobho,
anya-e0103n3:63_10: so sammadeva lobhaṁ pariyādātuṁ na sakkoti.
anya-e0103n3:64_0: Purimanayenevāti pubbe vuttanayānusārena mandā alobhādosā lobhadose pariyādātuṁ na sakkonti,
anya-e0103n3:64_1: amoho pana balavā mohaṁ pariyādātuṁ sakkotīti evaṁ tattha tattha vāre yathārahaṁ atidesattho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n3:65_3: eko tikoti lobhādiussadavasena akusalapakkheyeva satta vārā,
anya-e0103n3:65_4: tathā kusalapakkhe alobhādiussadavasenāti cuddasa vārā labbhanti.
anya-e0103n3:65_7: alobhadosamohā balavantoti āgatehi kusalapakkhe tatiyadutiyapaṭhamavārehi dosussadamohussadadosamohussadavārā gahitā eva honti,
anya-e0103n3:65_10: lobhādosāmohā balavantoti āgatehi tatiyadutiyapaṭhamavārehi adosussadaamohussadaadosāmohussadavārā gahitā
anya-e0103n3:65_11: evāti akusalakusalapakkhesu tayo tayo vāre antogadhe katvā aṭṭheva vārā dassitā.
anya-e0103n3:65_12: Ye pana ubhayesaṁ missatāvasena lobhālobhussadavārādayo apare ekūnapaññāsa vārā dassetabbā,
anya-e0103n3:65_14: Na hi ekasmiṁ santāne antarena avatthantaraṁ ‘‘lobho ca balavā,
anya-e0103n3:65_18: Tattha lobhassa tāva paṭipakkhavasena alobhena anadhibhūtatāya balavabhāvo,
anya-e0103n3:65_22: Tena vuttaṁ aṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘lobho balavā alobho mando,
anya-e0103n3:65_24: So ca nesaṁ mandabalavabhāvo purimūpanissayato tathā āsayassa paribhāvitatāya veditabbo.
anya-e0103n3:66_0: Yo luddhoti vuttoti yo ussadakittane ‘‘luddho’’ti vutto,
anya-e0103n3:66_6: Alobhādosānaṁ balavabhāvo saddhūpanissayatāya vinā na hotīti āha ‘‘aluddhaaduṭṭhā pasannapakatitāya saddhācaritā’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:67_0: Ayañca nayo sādhāraṇato vuttoti nibbattitapubbahetuniyāmavaseneva buddhicaritādikepi dassetuṁ ‘‘yathā vā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:67_2: upanissayato sampayogato ca paññāya abhisaṅkhatenāti attho.
anya-e0103n3:67_4: Lobhādinā vomissaparivārenāti ettha lobhamohādinā aññamaññaaviruddhavomissaparivārenāti attho.
anya-e0103n3:67_7: Ekaṁsena ca missakacariyāpi sampaṭicchitabbā pubbahetuniyāmena cariyāsiddhito.
anya-e0103n3:67_8: Tathā ceva ussadakittanaṁ pavattaṁ yathārahaṁ lobhālobhādīnaṁ vipākassa paccayabhāvato.
anya-e0103n3:68_0: ‘‘Gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte katamesaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti?
anya-e0103n3:68_1: Kusalakammassa javanakkhaṇe tayo hetū kusalā tasmiṁ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti,
anya-e0103n3:68_3: Nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū akusalā tasmiṁ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti,
anya-e0103n3:68_5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo hetū abyākatā tasmiṁ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti,
anya-e0103n3:69_5: Evaṁ lobhussadādayo puggalā rāgacaritādayo hontīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbanti.
anya-e0103n3:70_2: Puggalādhiṭṭhānena vuttopi attho dhammamukheneva paññāyatīti dhammādhiṭṭhānenāha ‘‘cariyāyo vibhāvaye’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:70_7: Anukaḍḍhitanti pādanikkhepasamaye kaḍḍhanto viya pādaṁ nikkhipati.
anya-e0103n3:70_8: Tenassa padaṁ anukaḍḍhitaṁ pacchato añchitaṁ hoti.
anya-e0103n3:70_15: Idamīdisaṁ padanti bhagavato padaṁ disvā vadati.
anya-e0103n3:71_6: Nipajjitvāti kāyapasāraṇalakkhaṇāya nipajjāya seyyāya nipajjitvā sayati niddāyati.
anya-e0103n3:71_7: Pakkhittakāyoti avakkhittakāyo avaso viya sahasā patitakāyo.
anya-e0103n3:73_0: Nipuṇamadhurasamasakkaccakārīti sukosallaṁ sundaraṁ avisamaṁ sābhisaṅkhārañca karaṇasīlo.
anya-e0103n3:76_9: cīvarādiparikkhārassa ca maṇḍanavasena pavattaṁ loluppaṁ cāpalyaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:77_2: Parassa guṇe ḍaṁsitvā apanento viya yugaggāhalakkhaṇo paḷāso.
anya-e0103n3:80_3: ‘‘Evañca evañca karissāmī’’ti kiccānaṁ rattibhāge parivitakkanaṁ rattiṁ dhūmāyanā.
anya-e0103n3:80_4: Tathāvitakkitānaṁ tesaṁ divasabhāge anuṭṭhānaṁ divā pajjalanā.
anya-e0103n3:80_5: Hurāhuraṁ dhāvanāti ito cito ca tattha tattha ārammaṇe cittavosaggo.
anya-e0103n3:81_1: aṭṭhakathāyañca anāgatamevāti na sakkā vattunti ‘‘sabbākārenā’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:81_2: Kiñci kiñci āgatampi atthevāti hi adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n3:81_3: ‘‘Na sārato paccetabba’’nti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṁ dassento ‘‘rāgacaritassa hī’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n3:81_4: Appamādavihārinoti tattha vinidhāya bhāvaṁ paṭipajjanena appamādakārino.
anya-e0103n3:82_4: Ekato onatassa pabbatapādassa heṭṭhābhāgo akatabhittibhūmiparikammo akatapabbhāro.
anya-e0103n3:82_13: Sāṇi viya kharasamphassanti sāṇiphalako viya dukkhasamphassaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:84_0: Vitakkavidhāvanasseva paccayo hoti yathā taṁ āyasmato meghiyattherassa.
anya-e0103n3:85_0: Pabhedaparicchedato nidānaparicchedato vibhāvanaparicchedato sappāyaparicchedatoti paccekaṁ pariccheda-saddo yojetabbo.
anya-e0103n3:85_2: Ekaccakasiṇānussatiṭṭhānamattassa pasaṅgena kathitattā vuttaṁ ‘‘na ca tāva cariyānukūlaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ sabbākārena āvikata’’nti.
anya-e0103n3:89_0: Dibbacakkhunā diṭṭhahadayarūpassa sattassa cittaṁ ādikammiko cetopariyañāṇena paricchindituṁ sakkoti,
anya-e0103n3:89_1: na itarassāti kasiṇapharaṇaṁ cetopariyañāṇassa paccayo hoti.
anya-e0103n3:89_2: Tena vuttaṁ ‘‘parasattānañca cetasā cittamaññātuṁ samattho hotī’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:89_4: Tathā uggahakosallassa sampāditattā paricchinnākāreneva tāni upatiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0103n3:89_7: na tena koci guṇoti dassento āha ‘‘ānisaṁsābhāvā cā’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:90_5: Thero hi paramāya vasipattiyā assamaṇḍale assaṁ sārento viya yattha tattha nisinnopi ṭhitopi taṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjateva.
anya-e0103n3:90_6: Tenassa samantato nimittaṁ vaḍḍhitaṁ viya upaṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0103n3:91_2: Ninnathalādivasena hi ekadese aṭṭhatvā samantato gahaṇavasena sakalasarīre nimittaṁ gaṇhantassa taṁ mahantaṁ hoti.
anya-e0103n3:91_4: Appaketi sarīrassa ekadese nimittaṁ gaṇhātīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n3:91_8: na ca koci ānisaṁso’’ti vuttaṁ ādīnavaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:92_0: Sesānipi na vaḍḍhetabbānīti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṁ upapattito vivarituṁ ‘‘kasmā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:92_1: Picupiṇḍādivasena upaṭṭhahantampi nimittaṁ vātasaṅghātasannissayanti katvā vuttaṁ ‘‘vātarāsiyeva vaḍḍhatī’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:92_3: Vāyokasiṇavaḍḍhane viya na ettha koci guṇo,
anya-e0103n3:92_7: Na ca tena attho atthīti tena sattarāsivaḍḍhanena pathavīkasiṇādivaḍḍhane viya kiñci payojanaṁ natthi.
anya-e0103n3:92_15: Yadi evaṁ kathaṁ parittādiārammaṇatā jhānassāti āha ‘‘parittaappamāṇārammaṇatāpettha pariggahavasenā’’ti,
anya-e0103n3:92_16: katipaye satte pariggahetvā pavattā mettādayo parittārammaṇā,
anya-e0103n3:92_21: na itaranti āha ‘‘na hi sakkā sabhāvadhammaṁvaḍḍhetu’’nti .
anya-e0103n3:93_9: Vātapānavivarādīhi antopaviṭṭhassa sūriyālokādikassa calanākāro paññāyatīti obhāsamaṇḍalārammaṇampi calitārammaṇaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:94_1: tattha asubhānaṁ paṭikūlassa ca āhārassa abhāvato.
anya-e0103n3:95_5: Ucchusassādīnaṁ pattesu pacalamānavaṇṇaggahaṇamukhena vā tassa gahetabbattā vuttaṁ ‘‘vāyokasiṇaṁ diṭṭhaphuṭṭhenā’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:95_6: Na ādikammikena gahetabbānīti ādikammikena na gahetabbāni,
anya-e0103n3:96_0: Imesu pana kammaṭṭhānesūti ettha kammaṭṭhānaggahaṇena yathārahaṁ ārammaṇānaṁ,
anya-e0103n3:97_7: na mohacaritavitakkacaritāpekkhaṁ tesaṁ aññassāpi anukūlassa alabbhanato .
anya-e0103n3:97_9: Imasseva ujuvipaccanīkaṁ imassa atisappāyanti gahetabbassa visesassa abhāvato sabbacaritānaṁ anukūlāni.
anya-e0103n3:98_4: paññāti imesu pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhānato upari.
anya-e0103n3:98_10: Aniccasaññāti ‘‘sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā’’ti (a. ni. 3.137; dha. pa. 277; mahāni.
anya-e0103n3:98_13: Ettha hi ekasseva cattāro dhammā bhāvetabbā vuttā,
anya-e0103n3:100_4: Somanassameva uppajjati ‘‘evaṁ bahuparissayoyaṁ attabhāvo ṭhāneyeva mayā niyyātito’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:101_2: ācariye aniviṭṭhapematāya vāti tadubhayaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘dubbaco vā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:101_3: Yo hi ācariyena tajjiyamāno kopañca dosañca apaccayañca pātukaroti,
anya-e0103n3:102_0: Tumhākamatthāyāti vutteti ‘‘sataporise papāte patanena tumhākaṁ koci attho hotī’’ti kenaci vutte.
anya-e0103n3:102_1: Ghaṁsentoti ‘‘manussakakkena tumhākaṁ koci attho’’ti vutte ghaṁsento niravasesaṁ attabhāvaṁ khepetuṁ ussaheyyaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:102_2: ‘‘Mama assāsapassāsanirundhanena tumhākaṁ koci rogavūpasamādiko attho atthī’’ti kenaci vutte.
anya-e0103n3:102_3: Tīhipi bhikkhūhi ācariye bhattipavedanamukhena vīriyārambho eva pavedito.
anya-e0103n3:103_1: Aññattha pavattitvāpi cittaṁ āgamma yattha seti,
anya-e0103n3:103_10: Idāni naṁ vibhāgena dassetuṁ ‘‘alobhādīnaṁ vasenā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:103_13: lokuttarānaṁ upanissayabhāvena ca sampanno ajjhāsayo etassāti sampannajjhāsayo, tena.
anya-e0103n3:103_15: anekaguṇāvahato ca sattānaṁ bahukārā visesato yogino.
anya-e0103n3:103_16: Tathā hi alobhādayo maccheramalādīnaṁ paṭipakkhabhāvena pavattanti.
anya-e0103n3:104_6: Tesu ca alobhena anadhikaṁ gaṇhāti luddhassa adhikaggahaṇato,
anya-e0103n3:105_0: ‘‘Alobhena cettha vijjamānaṁ dosaṁ dosato dhārento dose pavattati,
anya-e0103n3:105_2: Adosena vijjamānaṁ guṇaṁ guṇato dhārento guṇe pavattati,
anya-e0103n3:105_4: Amohena yāthāvasabhāvaṁ yāthāvasabhāvato dhārento yāthāvasabhāve pavattati ,
anya-e0103n3:105_7: Alobhena ca piyavippayogadukkhaṁ na hoti luddhassa piyasabbhāvato,
anya-e0103n3:105_9: adosena appiyasampayogadukkhaṁ na hoti duṭṭhassa appiyasabbhāvato,
anya-e0103n3:106_0: ‘‘Alobhena cettha jātidukkhaṁ na hoti alobhassa taṇhāpaṭipakkhato,
anya-e0103n3:106_2: adosena jarādukkhaṁ na hoti tikkhadosassa khippaṁ jarāsambhavato,
anya-e0103n3:107_0: ‘‘Visesato cettha alobhena pettivisaye upapatti na hoti,
anya-e0103n3:107_1: yebhuyyena hi sattā taṇhāya pettivisayaṁ upapajjanti,
anya-e0103n3:107_4: dosena hi caṇḍajātitāya dosasadisaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjanti,
anya-e0103n3:107_9: Etesu ca alobho rāgavasena upagamanassa abhāvakaro,
anya-e0103n3:108_0: ‘‘Tīhipi cetehi yathāpaṭipāṭiyā nekkhammasaññā abyāpādasaññā avihiṁsāsaññāti imā tisso,
anya-e0103n3:108_1: asubhasaññā appamāṇasaññā dhātusaññāti imā ca tisso saññāyo honti.
anya-e0103n3:108_8: Purimāni ca dve satipaṭṭhānāni purimānaṁ dvinnaṁ ānubhāvena,
anya-e0103n3:109_1: aluddho hi lobhanīyampi asappāyaṁ na sevati,
anya-e0103n3:109_4: aduṭṭho hi valitapalitāvahena dosagginā aḍayhamāno dīgharattaṁ yuvā hoti.
anya-e0103n3:109_6: amūḷho hi hitāhitaṁ ñatvā ahitaṁ parivajjento,
anya-e0103n3:110_4: amūḷho hi attano hitameva karonto attānaṁ sampādeti.
anya-e0103n3:111_0: ‘‘Alobhena cettha sakapakkhesu sattasaṅkhāresu nibbuto hoti tesaṁ vināsena abhisaṅgahetukassa dukkhassa abhāvā,
anya-e0103n3:112_1: luddho hi upabhogāsāya aniccepi saṅkhāre aniccato na passati.
anya-e0103n3:112_3: adosajjhāsayo hi pariccattaāghātavatthupariggaho saṅkhāreyeva dukkhato passati.
anya-e0103n3:112_5: amūḷho hi yāthāvagahaṇakusalo apariṇāyakaṁ khandhapañcakaṁ apariṇāyakato bujjhati.
anya-e0103n3:112_11: Ko hi nāma ‘aniccamida’nti sammā ñatvā tassatthāya pihaṁ uppādeyya,
anya-e0103n3:112_12: saṅkhāre vā ‘dukkha’nti jānanto aparampi accantatikhiṇaṁ kodhadukkhaṁ uppādeyya,
anya-e0103n3:113_1: upanissayabhāvena ca sampanno ajjhāsayo etassāti sampannajjhāsayo’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:114_0: Idāni te ajjhāsaye pāḷiyāva vibhāvetuṁ ‘‘yathāhā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:114_3: Ubhayaṁ pana ekajjhaṁ katvā chabbidhā ajjhāsayāti attho.
anya-e0103n3:114_7: Bodhiparipākāya saṁvattantīti yathābhinīhāraṁ attanā pattabbabodhiyā paripācanāya bhavanti.
anya-e0103n3:114_13: Lobhe dosadassāvinoti lubbhanalakkhaṇe lobhe sabbappakārena ādīnavadassāvino.
anya-e0103n3:114_16: alobhe ca ānisaṁsaṁ passantassa alobhajjhāsayo parivaḍḍhati,
anya-e0103n3:115_1: ‘‘ke vā te dhammā bahulaṁ samudācarantī’’ti pucchitabbo.
anya-e0103n3:115_2: Kiṁ vāti kiṁ asubhaṁ vā anussatiṭṭhānaṁ vā aññaṁ vā.
anya-e0103n3:115_3: Kiṁ te manasi karoto phāsu hotīti cittassa ekaggabhāvena sukhaṁ hoti.
anya-e0103n3:115_6: Tepi hi na sabbassa ekaṁsato byabhicārino eva.
anya-e0103n3:115_8: ‘‘Asukañca asukañca manasikāravidhiṁ katipayadivasaṁ anuyuñjāhī’’ti ca vattabbo.
anya-e0103n3:116_1: tattha sajjhāyavasena vā manasikāravasena vā kataparicayaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:116_2: Ekaṁ dve nisajjānīti ekaṁ vā dve vā uṇhāsanāni.
anya-e0103n3:116_3: Sajjhāyaṁ kāretvā attano sammukhāva adhīyāpetvā dātabbaṁ,
anya-e0103n3:117_2: Taṁ taṁ ākāranti ācariyena kammaṭṭhāne vuccamāne padapadatthādhippāyaopammādikaṁ attano ñāṇassa paccupaṭṭhitaṁ taṁ taṁ ākāraṁ,
anya-e0103n3:117_6: Evaṁ suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitassatitāya nimittaṁ gahetvā tattha sampajānakāritāya sakkaccaṁ suṇantena.
anya-e0103n3:117_9: Sabbākārenāti kassacipi pakārassa tattha asesitattā vuttaṁ.
